/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their red brick facades adding a touch of color to the otherwise monochrome cityscape. Trees and power lines crisscross above, creating a network of lines that intersect at various points along the street. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the red brick buildings. The image is slightly distorted due to the fisheye lens used, adding an artistic touch to the photograph.
